participant_1.background:
I dress professionally for work and wear comfortable clothes on vacation.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.
I take my dog for a walk in the park before I head to work at the museum.
i have a lot of allergies.

participant_2.background:
I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
i read a lot.

content.text: Hello! How's your day going?
Pretty good! I'm just watching Face Off on syfy right now.
Oh cool, I love that show! What do you like about it?
I love the creativity and how the contestants have to think outside the box. I'm also really interested in special effects makeup.
That's awesome! I'm not really creative at all, so I'm always impressed by people who can do that kind of stuff.
I'm not really creative either, but I love learning new things. I've been teaching myself how to sew recently, and it's been really fun.
That's great! I've always wanted to learn how to sew, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not that hard! There are lots of tutorials online that can help you get started.
I'll have to check that out. I'm always looking for new hobbies.
Me too! I love learning new things.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go hiking, and spend time with my dog.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by Stephen King or John Grisham.
I love Stephen King too! Have you read The Stand?
Yes, I loved it! It's one of my favorites.
Me too! It's so good.
We should read it together sometime!
That would be fun!
Great! I'll bring the book.
Awesome! I'll bring the snacks
